sentences.sContent: Instead of relegating himself to one media, Tuominen employs photography, printmaking, and painting, often mixing the techniques together to conjure the impression of memory.
sentences.sContent_eng: Instead of relegating himself to one media, Tuominen employs photography, printmaking, and painting, often mixing the techniques together to conjure the impression of memory.
sentences.sCn: 托米能不仅仅局限于一种媒介而是涉及了摄影，版画和绘画，通常混合各种手法来召唤记忆的印象。

sentences.sContent: The modern version of the artist to explore a variety of forms, sometimes in a print, according to the content needs and mix various types of printmaking methods, such as integrated graphics prints.
sentences.sContent_eng: The modern version of the artist to explore a variety of forms, sometimes in a print, according to the content needs and mix various types of printmaking methods, such as integrated graphics prints.
sentences.sCn: 现代的版画家为了探索多种多样的表现形式，有时在一幅版画内，按内容需要，同时混用各种类型的版画方法，这种版画称作综合版画。

trans.tranOther: Printmaking is an artistic technique that consists of making a series of pictures from an original, or from a specially prepared surface
